next_steps.note: "Define 'focus poetry' - Research and document specific characteristics, subgenres, or thematic elements that will define the scope of the project (e.g., haiku, tanka, concrete poetry, poems about attention/perception).",
"Brainstorm potential themes or prompts for focus poetry - Generate a list of at least 10 ideas that lend themselves well to focused observation and concise expression.",
"Research existing examples of focus poetry - Find 5-10 poems that exemplify the defined style and analyze their techniques (imagery, structure, language).",

"Create a basic template/structure for a 'focus poem' - Experiment with different formats (e.g., syllable counts, line lengths, visual arrangement) to develop a starting point for creating original work.",
"Write a first draft of one 'focus poem' based on a selected theme - This will serve as a practical test of the defined scope and chosen structure. "
